newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - SPSS near-term rating cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - SPSS near-term rating cut.

text.p: --EVEREN Securities Inc said Tuesday it downgraded its intermediate-term (six month) rating on SPSS Inc to market performer from outperform based on current valuations.
--Shares of SPSS, a Chicago-based statistical software company, rose 40 percent since EVEREN's upgrade on May 6, reaching a six-month price target of $28.
--"We believe the shares are more likely to perform in line with the market averages over the near term," it said in a report. Its EPS estimates of $1.18 for 1996 and $1.42 for 1997 are unchanged.
